Class PlanetCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlanetCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
iCard, Serializable
public class PlanetCard extends Card
Represents a "Planet" adventure card in the game this card allows players to land on available planets and collect cargo.

The player receives a list of available Planet options and selects one to land on. If the selected planet has not been visited, the player collects its cargo and loses a number of days. The card is exhausted once all planets have been visited or skipped.

See Also:

    • apply

      public void apply(Player p, int id)
      Applies the landing effect of this card for the given spaceship and player.

      If the planet selected has already been visited, or the response is -1 (skip), nothing happens. If a valid and unvisited planet is chosen, it is marked visited, the player receives cargo, and the card is exhausted once all planets are resolved.

      Parameters:
      p - The Player
      id - The Id
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if p is null
      ArgumentTooBigException - if the selected planet index is out of bounds
